verbs.description: something [V: hit] [ARG1: millennium tower and cracked window] an exterior impact is to blame for the cracked window on the 36th floor of the sinking millennium tower what might have caused that impact however is not addressed in a forensic report the building managers sent to city officials late tuesday the report comes after a month of anxious waiting for answers about what caused the window to crack since it opened in 2009 the san francisco tower has sunk by around 18 inches and is tilting to one side it has been deemed safe to inhabit but finger - pointing over who to blame for its problems has resulted in a number of lawsuits attorney bers millennium tower millennium tower association millennium tower san francisco san francisco president howard dickstein city department of building inspection shanghai rachel miller millennium allana buick bill strawn

something hit millennium tower and [V: cracked] [ARG1: window] an exterior impact is to blame for the cracked window on the 36th floor of the sinking millennium tower what might have caused that impact however is not addressed in a forensic report the building managers sent to city officials late tuesday the report comes after a month of anxious waiting for answers about what caused the window to crack since it opened in 2009 the san francisco tower has sunk by around 18 inches and is tilting to one side it has been deemed safe to inhabit but finger - pointing over who to blame for its problems has resulted in a number of lawsuits attorney bers millennium tower millennium tower association millennium tower san francisco san francisco president howard dickstein city department of building inspection shanghai rachel miller millennium allana buick bill strawn
